snippet: The virus has already killed 11 people in China, with 7 of those deaths reported in Shanghai, and the rest coming from three surrounding provinces.
lead_paragraph: The virus has already killed 11 people in China, with 7 of those deaths reported in Shanghai, and the rest coming from three surrounding provinces.

headline.seo: Avian Flu Virus Confirmed in Beijing for First Time
headline.main: Avian Flu Virus Confirmed in Beijing for First Time
